resources.string: Need to convert weight easily??? From Kilograms, Hektograms, Decagrams, Grams, Desigrams, Centigrams, dan Miligrams. Try it now!!!
This is a picture of a scale

The Weight Unit Conversion Application is an Android application that is made to assist users in converting from one unit of weight to another. Then this application is equipped with a share feature to help users if they want to share their conversion results

This application was created for Assesment 1 Programming for Mobile Devices 1

Copyright© 2025–2026 Alea Atapasya.
All rights reserved

Here are the procedures for using the weight conversion application, including:

1.Choose the initial unit
By clicking the dropdown menu and choose the weight unit

2.Choose the final unit
By clicking the dropdown menu and choose the weight unit

3. Enter the weight unit
By tapping the input column and entering the weight number you want to convert.

4.Click the calculate button
Click the calculate button to see the conversion results

5. View and share the results
Then you can see the results and can share the results using the share button

Initial Unit: %1$s
Converted To: %2$s

Value before conversiom: %3$s %1$s Results after conversion: %4$s %2$s
